column5: Ya, with the cost of non toxic shot, it would make the average Joe poor in about 1 day of anything hunting, other than it's totally illegal.
The old street sweeper with a slight modification.Very nice duck gun...Just so you know,only 3 shells allowed in your gun for hunting here in Virginia. Joe
I know, I just found it interesting to share.
Clamp It, how many times have we told you...  you cant use your Pancor Jackhammer with the lazer sights and the 48 shot clip to hunt geese here!  :D
Uncle Buck, Maybe they should use the beretta on the USA carp problem eh?
Just as sporting as fishing with dynamite.
Uncle Buck, it was in reference to the Asian Silver Carp invasive species.  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yS7zkTnQVaM...feature=related
